title: I have been losing lp due to my client not responding when I enter a ranked game
body: As the title says when I am in the screen to pick champs my league suddenly does not respond. I know that this is not just my computer having this problem because some of my friends have had it too. Most of the time when it happens I have to use task manager to close league because it will just sit as a white screen. So if you guys could find a fix to this that would be nice because if im gonna lose lp it better be a game worth dodging.

replies.body:
This issue is most often tied to an *unstable connection* to our servers and can commonly be resolved by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). That guide will go over some frequent network misconfigurations that often result in a less-than-optimal connection to League.

Let me know if this helped.
